Woodruff Papers Scripture Matches

Matches per volume

Code 
from IPython.display import Markdown
from tabulate import tabulate
import pandas as pd

number_of_rows = 50
path_mathes = "../woodruff/data/all_books/data_matches_extensions_temporary.csv"
top_matches = pd.read_csv(path_mathes).sort_values(by='score',ascending=False)[['date', 'verse_title','score','matches_woodruff','matches_scriptures']]

# matches_counts = top_matches.groupby(['volume_title']).count().reset_index()[['volume_title', 'phrase_woodruff']]
# matches_counts
def create_markdown_table(data):
  markdown_table = Markdown(tabulate(
    data.head(number_of_rows),
    headers=list(data)
  ))
  return markdown_table

# match count/volume
# Markdown(tabulate(
#   matches_counts,
#   headers=list(matches_counts)
# ))

create_markdown_table(top_matches.head(50))
